str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From the base of chraomai or chre; employment, i.e. An affair; also occasion, demand, requirement or destitution.
Or Mariam of Hebrew origin; Maria or Mariam, the name of six Christian females.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pick out for myself, choose, elect, select. Middle voice from ek and lego; to select.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Feminine of meros; a portion, i.e. Province, share or participation.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Feminine Singular

word: will not be taken away from
parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To take away, smite off. From apo and haireomai; to remove.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
